name: SuperBac: 2050
description:
You, little bacteria, are destined to become a SuperBac! Explore an microscopic aqueous environment filled with
bacteria, nutrients, debris, phages and antibiotics. Discover new genes, build up your genome,
grow your numbers and above all survive.

SuperBac is a short microbiology atmospheric-survival-simulation game where you play a little bacteria trying to become a bacterial super bug with full antibiotic resistance.

It features world generation, bacteria simulation with sensory awareness and gene/DNA mechanics, high-definition textures and 3D modelling.

Inspired and approved by Microbiologists.
A solo developer's first 3D mini-game.
Built with Unity3D and Blender.
